ServicesÔÉÅ

Service modules implement business logic for each API endpoint.

Base ServicesÔÉÅ

Abstract base classes for Numista services.

class numistalib.services.base.service.BaseService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: ABC

Abstract base service class for all Numista services.

Enforces strict patterns for: - Client injection via duck-typing - Converting raw data to typed models - Centralized HTTP error handling - Consistent caching and logging

All concrete services must implement model conversion logic.

__init__(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol) → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Initialize base service with HTTP client.

Parameters:

client (SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol) ‚Äì HTTP client conforming to the sync or async protocol

property copyright_text: strÔÉÅ

Get the copyright text for logging and display.

Returns:

Service copyright text

Return type:

str

handle_cli_error(err: Exception, context: str, command: str) → NoReturn[source]ÔÉÅ

Handle CLI errors with consistent logging and user-friendly display.

Logs full traceback to module logger for debugging, displays friendly error message to user via Rich error console, then exits with code 1.

Parameters:

  • err (Exception) ‚Äì The exception that occurred

  • context (str) ‚Äì Human-readable context (e.g., ‚Äúlisting catalogues‚Äù, ‚Äúfetching issuer details‚Äù)

  • command (str) ‚Äì Command name for log correlation (e.g., ‚Äúcat-list‚Äù, ‚Äúisr-get‚Äù)

Examples

>>> try:
...     results = service.list_catalogues()
... except (RuntimeError, OSError, ValueError) as e:
...     service._handle_cli_error(e, "listing catalogues", "cat-list")
property last_cache_indicator: strÔÉÅ

Get the cache indicator for the last response.

Returns:

Cache hit (üíæ) or cache miss (üåê) indicator

Return type:

str

property title_text: strÔÉÅ

Get the title text for logging and display.

Returns:

Service title text

Return type:

str

abstractmethod to_models(items: list[Mapping[str, Any]], **kwargs: Any) → list[Any][source]ÔÉÅ

Convert raw API items to typed domain models.

Parameters:

  • items (list[Mapping[str, Any]]) ‚Äì Raw items from API response

  • **kwargs (Any) ‚Äì Service-specific conversion context (e.g., parent IDs)

Returns:

List of typed domain models

Return type:

list[Any]

class numistalib.services.base.service.EntityService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: BaseService

Base for single-entity endpoints.

Used for endpoints like: - /users/{user_id} ‚Üí {‚Äúuser‚Äù: {‚Ä¶}} - /types/{type_id} ‚Üí {‚Ä¶}

Subclasses implement to_models() for single-item conversion.

to_models(items: list[Mapping[str, Any]], **kwargs: Any) → list[Any][source]ÔÉÅ

Convert single entity (wrapped in list for interface consistency).

Parameters:

  • items (list[Mapping[str, Any]]) ‚Äì Single-item list containing entity data

  • **kwargs (Any) ‚Äì Conversion context

Returns:

Single-item list with converted entity

Return type:

list[Any]

class numistalib.services.base.service.NestedResourceService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: BaseService

Base for endpoints with path parameters creating nested resources.

Used for endpoints like: - /types/{type_id}/issues ‚Üí {‚Äúissues‚Äù: [‚Ä¶]} - /types/{type_id}/issues/{issue_id}/prices ‚Üí {‚Äúprices‚Äù: [‚Ä¶]}

Subclasses must: 1. Define CLASS_ITEMS_KEY 2. Implement to_models() with required context parameters

CLASS_ITEMS_KEY: str = 'items'ÔÉÅ
class numistalib.services.base.service.SimpleListService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: BaseService

Base for endpoints returning a simple list of items in a single key.

Used for endpoints like: - /catalogues ‚Üí {‚Äúcatalogues‚Äù: [‚Ä¶]} - /mints ‚Üí {‚Äúmints‚Äù: [‚Ä¶]}

Subclasses must: 1. Define CLASS_ITEMS_KEY (e.g., ‚Äúcatalogues‚Äù) 2. Implement to_models() to convert raw items

CLASS_ITEMS_KEY: str = 'items'ÔÉÅ

Types ServiceÔÉÅ

Type service implementation.

class numistalib.services.types.service.SearchParams(query: str | None = None, issuer: str | None = None, year: int | None = None, category: str | None = None, lang: str = 'en', page: int = 1, count: int = 100)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

class numistalib.services.types.service.TypeBasicService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: TypeBasicServiceBase

Type search service returning TypeBasic models.

async paginated_search(params: SearchParams) → AsyncGenerator[TypeBasic][source]ÔÉÅ

Search the type catalogue and yield results lazily across paginated responses.

params (SearchParams) ‚Äì Search parameters (query, issuer, year, category)

Yields:

TypeBasic ‚Äì Individual type models from paginated responses

params (SearchParams) ‚Äì Search parameters (query, issuer, year, category, page)

Returns:

List of matching basic type models

Return type:

async search_types_async(params: SearchParams) → list[TypeBasic][source]ÔÉÅ

params (SearchParams) ‚Äì Search parameters (query, issuer, year, category, page)

Returns:

List of matching basic type models

list[TypeBasic]

async search_types_paginated(query: str | None = None, issuer: str | None = None, year: int | None = None, category: str | None = None, limit: int = 50, lang: str = 'en') → AsyncGenerator[TypeBasic][source]ÔÉÅ

Search the type catalogue and yield results lazily.

Parameters:

  • query (str | None) ‚Äì Full-text search query

  • issuer (str | None) ‚Äì Issuer code to filter by

  • year (int | None) ‚Äì Year to filter by

  • category (str | None) ‚Äì Category to filter by (coin, banknote, exonumia)

  • limit (int) ‚Äì Maximum results per page (default 50)

  • lang (str) ‚Äì Language code (default ‚Äòen‚Äô)

Yields:

TypeBasic ‚Äì Individual type models

to_models(items: list[Mapping[str, Any]], **kwargs: Any) → list[TypeBasic][source]ÔÉÅ

Parameters:

  • items (list[Mapping[str, Any]]) ‚Äì Raw type data from API

  • **kwargs (Any) ‚Äì Unused context parameters

Returns:

Validated TypeBasic models

Return type:

list[TypeBasic]

class numistalib.services.types.service.TypePagedResponse(*, types: list[dict[str, Any]], next_url: str | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: BaseModel

Pagination response wrapper for types search.

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}ÔÉÅ

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

next_url: str | NoneÔÉÅ
types: list[dict[str, Any]]ÔÉÅ
class numistalib.services.types.service.TypeService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: TypeFullService, TypeBasicService, TypeServiceBase

Composite type service combining search (basic) and detail (full).

Note: mypy reports to_models conflict between TypeBasicService (returns list[TypeBasic]) and TypeFullService (returns list[TypeFull]). This is inherent to composite service design; each parent class uses its own to_models internally. Python MRO resolves correctly at runtime.

Collection service implementation.

class numistalib.services.collections.service.CollectionService(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: CollectionServiceBase

Unified collection service supporting both sync and async clients.

Requires OAuth authentication with appropriate scopes.

__init__(client: SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol) → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Initialize collection service.

Parameters:

client (SyncClientProtocol | AsyncClientProtocol) ‚Äì HTTP client instance (sync or async)

add_collected_item(user_id: int, item_data: dict[str, object]) → CollectedItem[source]ÔÉÅ

Add item to user‚Äôs collection.

Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication with ‚Äòedit_collection‚Äô scope.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) ‚Äì Numista user ID

  • item_data (dict) ‚Äì Item data payload

Returns:

Created collected item

Return type:

CollectedItem

Raises:

httpx.HTTPStatusError ‚Äì If API returns error

search_by_image(images: list[dict[str, str]], category: str | None = None, lang: str = 'en', activate_experimental_features: bool = False) → list[TypeBasic][source]ÔÉÅ

Search catalogue by image(s).

This is a paid feature.

Supports both sync and async clients via duck-typing.

Parameters:

  • images (list[dict]) ‚Äì List of image objects with ‚Äòmime_type‚Äô and ‚Äòimage_data‚Äô keys. Max 2 images. Max size 1024x1024 px.

  • category (str | None) ‚Äì Filter by category (coin, banknote, exonumia)

  • lang (str) ‚Äì Language code

  • activate_experimental_features (bool) ‚Äì Enable experimental features (beta, longer response time)

Returns:

List of matching types (up to 100)

Return type:

list[TypeBasic]

Raises:

  • httpx.HTTPStatusError ‚Äì If API returns error

  • ValueError ‚Äì If invalid image count or size

  • issue_id (int) ‚Äì Numista issue ID

to_models(items: list[Mapping[str, Any]], issue_id: int | None = None, **kwargs: Any) → list[Price][source]ÔÉÅ

Convert API response to Price models.

The API returns {currency: ‚ÄúEUR‚Äù, prices: [{grade: ‚Äúf‚Äù, price: 180}]}, so we need to extract the top-level currency and merge it with each price.

Parameters:

  • items (list[Mapping[str, Any]]) ‚Äì Raw API response items (single dict with currency and prices array)

  • issue_id (int | None) ‚Äì Numista issue ID (required context)

  • **kwargs (Any) ‚Äì Additional conversion context

Returns:

Parsed price models

Return type:

list[Price]

numistalib.services.prices.service.PriceServiceAsyncÔÉÅ

alias of PriceService
